# Welcome to VaultSite

This is your notes explorer built with Next.js.

## Getting Started

Place your markdown files in the `content/` folder and they will automatically appear in the sidebar.

## Features

- ğŸ“ Folder-based organization
- ğŸ“ Markdown rendering with syntax highlighting
- ğŸ”— Wiki-style links
- ğŸ“± Responsive design

## Adding Content

Simply create `.md` files in the content folder:

```bash
content/
  â”œâ”€â”€ Welcome.md
  â”œâ”€â”€ Folder1/
  â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Note1.md
  â””â”€â”€ Folder2/

```

Happy note-taking!
